annotation.spannedText: vaccines have become a target for misinformation that has undermined immunization efforts in parts of the U.S., U.K. and elsewhere, contributing to dangerous and potentially lethal disease outbreaks of measles, polio and more

annotation.spannedText: investigation of vaccines in ASD children is important in a variety of ways including making sure they are as efficacious and safe as they are in other ‘normal’ populations

classMention.mentionClass: investigation of vaccines in ASD children is important in a variety of ways including making sure they are as efficacious and safe as they are in other ‘normal’ populations

annotation.spannedText: vaccines play an important part in the prevention of disease in vulnerable children with neurodevelopmental diseases and other disabilities — as well as the wider population

classMention.mentionClass: vaccines play an important part in the prevention of disease in vulnerable children with neurodevelopmental diseases and other disabilities — as well as the wider population

annotation.spannedText: It leads to more interesting questions surrounding the science and medicine in this cohort of children

classMention.mentionClass: It leads to more interesting questions surrounding the science and medicine in this cohort of children

annotation.spannedText: the answer to treatment and care may in fact lie in researching the outcomes of bacteria, virus or other pathogens, rather than vaccines in ASD children specifically

classMention.mentionClass: the answer to treatment and care may in fact lie in researching the outcomes of bacteria, virus or other pathogens, rather than vaccines in ASD children specifically

annotation.spannedText: We should also not confine ourselves simply to the ‘outcome’ of ASD in children but also keep in mind the varying and serious co-morbid diseases and complications in this cohort of children

annotation.spannedText: One’s attention needs to be bought to two recent studies surrounding co-morbid conditions in ASD

annotation.spannedText: The probable reason she has not seen ‘expression’ data is that the research has not been done

annotation.spannedText: we should be asking, if this cohort of children is as vulnerable to infectious diseases and viruses as the research indicates

annotation.spannedText: that is becoming clearer each day
